alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Valley; Garfield; McCone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 3:48PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Garfield, south central Valley and northwestern McCone Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 347 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles south of The Pines Rec Area to 10 miles west of Flowing Wells Rest Area. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Peck, The Pines Rec Area, Fort Peck Marina, Duck Creek Rec Area, Nelson Creek Rec Area, Rock Creek Rec Area, Haxby and Van Norman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
